titles.title: I Just Can't Thank Him Enough

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I just can't thank Him enough
I just can't praise Him enough
I just can't tell the Lord how much He means to me.
He brought me out of the miry clay,
Set my feet on the Rock to stay.
I just can't thank Him enough,
For what He's done for me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We have redemption through His blood,
The forgiveness of sins,
According to the riches of His grace.
He hath abounded toward us
In all wisdom and prudence,
Making known to us the mystery of His will.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
No alcanzo yo agradecer (2x)
Ni ha contar lo que ha hecho para mi.
Desde el pantano Dios me saco.
Sobre la Roca mis pies afirmo.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
No alcanzo yo agradecer, Su gran amor.
Hay redencion en Su amor,
De los pecados perdon,
Conforme a Sus riquezas para mi.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
El abundo hacia nosotros,
En sabiduria y prudencia
